Monitor, Debug, and Improve Reliability: Set up observability tools (Datadog, Prometheus, New Relic) to monitor performance, detect anomalies, and ensure high system uptime. Implement logging and alerting strategies to proactively address issues before they impact users
Optimize Cloud Infrastructure & Security: Ensure cloud infrastructure is secure, scalable, and cost-effective by implementing best practices in IAM, secrets management, and API security. Work with tools like Terraform and Kubernetes to automate infrastructure provisioning and enhance system resilience
Drive Innovation: Stay ahead of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices to continuously enhance our tech stack and processes
Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Work closely with product managers, designers, and other teams to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions
Ensure Code Quality and Reliability: Implement testing strategies, conduct code reviews, and promote best practices in CI/CD workflows



What We Look For

Proven Leadership: You have experience leading a team of engineers, setting technical direction, and mentoring developers
Full-Stack Expertise: Strong proficiency in Node.js, SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL), and frontend technologies like React, Angular, or Vue
Cloud & Infrastructure Knowledge: Hands-on experience with Google Cloud Services, including Firebase, Compute, Containers, and API Management
System Design & Architecture: Ability to design robust, scalable, and secure system architectures that support millions of users
AI Model Deployment & API Management: Experience in integrating AI models into production environments, optimizing API performance, and managing AI-related infrastructure. Familiarity with AI inference pipelines and efficient model-serving strategies
Code Quality Advocate: You take pride in writing clean, modular, maintainable, and scalable code that’s easy to extend
Testing & Automation: Experience in unit testing, test automation tools, and CI/CD pipelines
Observability & Monitoring: Familiarity with logging, monitoring, and alerting tools to ensure high system uptime and reliability
Security & Compliance Best Practices: Strong understanding of IAM, secrets management, and API security
Problem-Solving Focused: Ability to break down complex problems, propose solutions, and drive decision-making
Communication & Collaboration: You can articulate complex technical concepts clearly and work effectively across teams
Agile Mindset: Comfortable working in fast-paced, iterative development cycles with an emphasis on continuous improvement
Fluent in English: Strong verbal and written communication skills for technical discussions and collaboration



What We Offer

Work with exceptional people. At AppNation, you’ll collaborate with small, autonomous, results-driven teams alongside some of the most talented minds in the mobile app industry
A platform for growth. We go above and beyond to hire individuals with extraordinary potential and provide them with the opportunities, resources, and challenges to thrive. At AppNation, young professionals often take on leadership roles in projects that reach millions of users. If you’ve got the drive, you’ll quickly find yourself playing a pivotal role in shaping our success
Competitive compensation. We offer salaries that are above the standard for our sector, ensuring that you’re rewarded fairly for your skills, dedication, and impact. Compensation grows rapidly as you contribute more to the team’s success, ensuring your financial growth matches your career progress
Unmatched benefits. Work-from-home Wednesdays, access to learning materials, premium private health insurance, meal and commute compensation, comprehensive relocation support, and even a day off to celebrate your birthday. We’re dedicated to creating an environment where you can do your best work—and enjoy the journey



The Recruitment Process

We’ve designed a rigorous yet rewarding process to find the best fit for both you and our team:


 Application Review: We’ll carefully assess your CV and experience
 First Interview: A 30-minute online interview with our People & Culture team to discuss your background, goals, and alignment with our mission
 Case Study: A practical assignment to demonstrate your expertise and problem-solving skills
 Technical Interview: A deep dive with our team lead, focusing on technical topics and assessing your knowledge
 Team Interview: Meet with the founders to discuss your vision, aspirations, and how we can grow together
 CEO Interview: A one-on-one conversation with our CEO to discuss alignment on vision, culture, and long-term goals
 Final Decision: We’ll get back to you within a few days with our decision



Before You Apply

At AppNation, we set ambitious goals and demand the best from ourselves and each other. This creates a fast-paced, challenging environment that offers unparalleled opportunities for growth, achievement, and learning.

We value passion, potential, and a willingness to grow. If this role excites you and you believe you have what it takes, we encourage you to apply—even if you don’t check every box.

title: Full Stack Engineer
details:
At Apollo, we’re building the brain of sustainable business.
As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you’ll play a key role in scaling the infrastructure that helps large enterprises cut emissions, optimize energy, and meet sustainability goals.
You’ll work closely with product and design teams to turn ideas into features, data into insights, and a growing platform into a world-class SaaS product.

🧠 What You’ll Do
Develop and maintain Apollo’s core SaaS platform, across both frontend and backend
Collaborate with product and design to bring new features to life, from idea to deployment
Write clean, scalable, and testable code across the stack (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, etc.)
Improve platform performance, architecture, and reliability
Review code, mentor junior engineers, and contribute to a high-performance dev culture
Integrate AI models and data pipelines that power sustainability insights
Work closely with customers and internal teams to iterate fast and ship smart

✅ What We’re Looking For
4+ years of full stack development experience, preferably in a SaaS product environment
Strong knowledge of React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and modern web architecture
Experience designing APIs, working with scalable backend systems
Familiar with CI/CD, Docker, cloud services (GCP, AWS, or similar)
Product-minded — you care about UX and business impact, not just code
Comfortable in fast-paced, collaborative startup environments
Strong communication skills in English
Bonus: experience working on data-heavy or sustainability-related platforms

🌍 Why Join Apollo?
Build something meaningful — software that reduces emissions and energy waste
Join a team of curious, driven people who care deeply about impact
Help shape the future of sustainability tech from the ground up
Work on hard problems, fast — and see the real-world results of your code
Competitive salary, early-stage stock options, and a high-trust work culture

If you’re a builder who thrives on ownership, product-thinking, and writing great code that matters — let’s talk.
Apply now and help us shape the intelligence layer of a sustainable future.

details:

title: Sr. React Native Developer
details:
At HubX we build mobile apps, used and loved by millions all around the world.

We have a track record of building and growing mobile apps on various verticals that reached over 200 million users across 6 continents and 170+ countries.

We are looking for a talented “Sr. React Native Developer” to join our energetic and highly motivated team.

As a talented “Sr. React Native Developer”, you have plenty of opportunities at your fingertips. So, why should HubX be your next move?

We offer you an opportunity to make a huge impact in the lives of millions of users through our products, and even the mobile app industry at large in the next years to come.

X Culture: Do What You Love

At HubX, we pride ourselves on fostering an environment of collaboration, creativity, and innovation. Our #XCulture is more than just a workplace ethos; it's a lifestyle. We believe passion drives success. At HubX, Do What You Love isn’t just a motto; it's the foundation of our work.

Some Of Your Responsibilities

Create beautiful, pixel-perfect UIs across both mobile platforms that look and feel native.
Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
Work alongside our product owner and UI/UX designers to realize your shared vision.
Write automated tests that give us the confidence to iterate quickly and ensure the product is of the highest quality
Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks
Engage with the React Native community to report, request, and help implement critical software fixes
Maintain a stable and current-when-possible React Native create an environment for our CI pipeline
Stay current on the latest platform capabilities so that we know whats possible
Practice Scrum with a great group of developers and product managers

What We Look For

5+ years experience in mobile application development 
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+), including advanced concepts like closures, context, and asynchronous patterns.
Deep understanding of mobile architecture, component patterns, and rendering lifecycles in React Native.
Experience integrating and debugging In-App Purchase systems on iOS and Android (StoreKit, Google Play Billing).
Demonstrated experience with CI/CD systems, ideally using GitHub Actions, EAS, CircleCI.
Solid understanding of mobile performance optimization and profiling tools (Flipper, Hermes, etc.).
Experience consuming RESTful APIs and working with tools like Axios, React Query, or RTK Query.
Strong knowledge of automated testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Detox, Testing Library).
Practical experience with Agile/Scrum, sprint planning, retrospectives, and cross-functional collaboration.
Excellent problem-solving skills, ownership mindset, and a drive for continuous improvement.
Ability to write clean, maintainable code with attention to code quality, scalability, and documentation.
Good command of written and spoken English. 

The Perks And Benefits Of Working With Us

We would like you to focus on what you do best, we take care of the rest.

Huge impact: Your work can significantly impact our millions of users, and even the mobile app industry at large in the next years to come.
A competitive compensation package: A competitive compensation package: Our total compensation package is very comprehensive; covering your cost of commuting for our headquarters as well as providing you with a meal card.
A unique and top-notch office: Our Istanbul office is located at Levent, right in the heart of the city. Surrounded by the energy of Istanbul’s bustling core, it’s a space designed for creativity and collaboration.
You can come to our office or work wherever you want. If you choose the on-site option, keep in mind that it’s still fine to sometimes work remotely.
Unlimited coffee from XPresso: You can grab a cup of coffee whenever you need—whether it’s to kickstart your morning or power through the day.
Limitless Snacks & Breakfast: Fuel your day with our fully stocked kitchen! From a hearty breakfast to a variety of snacks available anytime, we’ve got everything you need to stay energized and focused.
Ownership, opportunity to take responsibility from day one: No one will micromanage you. Together with your team, you’ll be free to choose a direction, test, fail, and test the next idea.
Team events that create lasting memories, including our traditional All Hands gatherings where the whole company comes together, as well as more humble celebrations and happy hours. Curious about our vibe? Take a look at our Instagram!
Continuous education: The more you want to improve your knowledge, the more we support you!
Strong company culture: Our approach is always open communication & teamwork. #XCulture
Private Medical Insurance & HPV Vaccine: We go above and beyond for your health.
Gym Reimbursement: We support annual gym membership because we want you to be in tip-top shape psychically and mentally.
X Community Discounts: Being part of HubX comes with perks, enjoy exclusive discounts and more as a valued member of our community.
A brand new Macbook and Welcome Kit

The Recruiting Process

At HubX, we value transparency and efficiency. Here’s a glimpse into our streamlined recruitment process:

Application Submission: Apply by submitting your CV, LinkedIn profile, or a brief introduction about yourself.
Talent & Culture Interview: Engage in a conversation with our Talent & Culture team to discuss your background, aspirations, and how we align with each other’s goals.
Case Study Assignment: Showcase your skills through a practical task related to the role.
Technical Interview: Meet with your potential team lead for an in-depth review of your case study and technical expertise.
Welcome Aboard!: If all goes well, we’re excited to extend an offer and welcome you to the team.

Your personal data collected through your job applications will be processed by HubX in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("KVKK") for the recruitment and evaluation. To review our data protection informing text: Link

title: Hazine Pozisyon Yönetimi Ve Ürün Geliştirme Uzmanı/Yönetmeni
details:
Main Responsibilities;

Manage the Bank’s FX position with profit maximization and risk management approach in a faced paced environment and volatile market conditions,
Analyze the transactions and rates on the Bank’s FX platform (Digit), compare them with similar platforms in the market, and evaluate feedbacks from users,
Analyze customer behavior to cluster users to optimize spreads,
Comply with regulatory requirements and react swiftly in case of a problem,
Improve Digit in close collaboration with Business units, branches, and customers,
Define and measure KPIs for Digit, determine key financial targets and analyze competitors,
Define, prioritize, and communicate short-, mid-and long-term goals of the product by owning and maintaining a visible product roadmap,
Collaborate with user experience experts, visual designers, and engineers to reach the best possible version of a product,
Create and maintain product backlogs.
Prioritize development activities with engineering teams, assist in determining the best technical implementation methods, work closely with BA on acceptance testing, and lead product launches,
Validate opportunities through research, data analysis, competitive research, and other relevant tools,
Act as the voice of the user and key stakeholders during day-to-day aspects of product development,
Help define and refine working processes in order to maximize efficiency in constantly evolving environments,
Meet frequently with business units, analysts, engineers, and other Digit stakeholders to capture requirements and communicate the progress of new product releases,

The ideal candidate will have;

A minimum of a Bachelor's degree is required, MBA is preferred,
Knowledge in SQL, Python, and/or PowerBI is required,
Have 2+ years of Product Management or Business Analyst experience, having managed at least one entire product development cycle from concept to launch is preferred,
Fluent in spoken and written English,
Having a great eye for understanding and tracking data, using analytical skills to support the evolution of the product roadmap,
Flexible to changes, eager to learn, proactive to act, resilient to failure, persistent in making an impact,
Great communication and negotiation skills,

title: Software Engineering Manager
details:
We are a leading leisure airline with a mission to deliver seamless, safe, and efficient travel experiences—powered by technology. Our in-house IT development team plays a critical role in supporting the internal operational backbone of our airline. As we expand and innovate, we’re looking for a passionate Engineering Manager to join our growing team.

As an Engineering Manager, you will lead a small but highly skilled group of software developers across multiple squads. You’ll work closely with Business Analysts and Technical Product Owners to deliver high-impact, reliable digital solutions for our internal operations. You’ll be responsible not just for delivery, but also for mentoring engineers, fostering innovation, and elevating engineering practices across the board.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead, mentor, and support a team of engineers working on mission-critical internal systems.
Establish and uphold team norms and engineering standards , promoting a culture of accountability and excellence.
Contribute to technical discussions and architecture decisions , leveraging your software engineering expertise to guide quality and scalability.
Collaborate with technical product owners and business analysts to align on priorities and deliver solutions that meet real-world operational needs.
Collaborate with stakeholders "to align on priorities, maintain a clear roadmap, and ensure transparency across technical and non-technical teams.
Drive engineering excellence through code quality, automation, performance optimization, and modern DevOps practices.
Champion the adoption of AI-based development tools and innovative technologies to improve team productivity and code quality.
Support career development through coaching, training opportunities, and performance feedback.
Help scale our architecture and development practices as we expand our use of Azure and explore AWS.
Oversee mobile app development initiatives (React Native) alongside backend and cloud projects.


What We’re Looking For:

Minimum 8 years of working experience.
Bachelor's degree in in Engineering, Management or related fied; master’s degree preferred.
Proven experience as a software engineering leader or manager, ideally in a high-availability or operational tech environment.
Deep technical expertise — comfortable diving into architecture discussions, code reviews, and technical decision making
Strong technical background in.NET Framework, .NET Core, React, Vue,TypeScript and cloud-native development on Azure.
Strong experience with Microsoft SQL Server (T-SQL stored procedures,functions, queries). Knowledge of Oracle PL/SQL.
Experience with RESTful and SOAP Web Services, and GraphQL APIs.
Experience in consuming messages from Azure Event Hub, Kafka.
Exposure to or curiosity about AWS and cross-cloud strategies.
Experience or interest in mobile app development using React Native with Expo is a plus.
A passion for continuous learning, mentoring, and improving engineering culture.
Familiarity with AI-driven developer tools (e.g., GitHub Copilot, CursorAI, CI/CD optimization, automated testing frameworks) is a strong advantage.
Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.

Why Join Us?

Be part of a mission-driven airline at the heart of operational excellence.
Work with modern tech in an environment that values experimentation, innovation, and learning.
Enjoy flexibility, a collaborative culture, and direct impact on systems used by the aviation professionals every day.


SunExpress, as an Equal Opportunity Employer, welcomes all applicants independent of individual differences. We believe that having a diversified talent is our biggest strength. All decisions about our current and potential talent are based solely on criteria that have nothing to do with an applicant's attributes that are irrelevant to job performance; at SunExpress, we only focus on competency, know-how, skills, and experience.


SunExpress is named “Europe's Best Leisure Airline” in 2024 by Skytrax. SunExpress is also awarded the Great Place to Work Certificate in 2023 and 2024 as a result of the employee survey conducted by the research and consulting firm Great Place to Work®, the global benchmark for identifying and recognizing outstanding employee experience.

Çeşitlilik yaklaşımımız
Çeşitliliğin gücüne inanan ve herkesin işe katkısını önemseyen uluslararası yaklaşımları dikkate alıyor, kapsayıcılığın işimizin gelişmesine farklı açılardan katkı sağladığına inanıyoruz. Çeşitliliğin temsil edildiği kuruluşlar başarılarını artırırken, kişilerin kendilerine değer verildiğini hissettiği iş ortamlarında çalışan bağlılığı ve verimliliğinde daha olumlu sonuçlar elde edildiğini görüyoruz. Eşit istihdam sağlamayı görev edinen bir kurum olarak çeşitliliği destekliyoruz.

Çalışanlarımızın mesleki ve kişisel gelişimine fırsat sunan, kendilerini en iyi şekilde göstermelerini sağlayan, gelişimlerine odaklanan işbirlikçi ve kapsayıcı bir çalışma ortamı yaratmak için yeni adımlar atmaya devam ediyoruz.

title: Software Development Engineer
details:
We are the catalyst for the industrial world’s digital transformation.

For more than 35 years, ground breaking technologies and business models engineered and developed by Siemens Turkey R&D department contributes to the global success of Siemens

Our R&D activities focused on the fields of electrification, automation and digitalization, provides end-to-end support to our global customers on their unique digital transformation journey.

We aim to increase our strength on solution and product development with world class SW development experts, with the vision to be the digitalization partner for our global customers.

We need game changers like you, to bring the next level of smart manufacturing and infrastructure from mere concept to reality, develop tomorrow’s smart cities, and address the most critical digitalization challenges across a comprehensive range of industries.

What are my responsibilities?

 Software development activities in the industrial domain, including design, implementation, documentation and testing
 Implementation of innovative platform / application by utilizing new technologies
 Producing high quality project deliverables within planned time and effort
 Conforming to Siemens processes, quality standards and guidelines

What do I need to qualify for this job?

 BSc, MSc, or PhD in Computer Science or a related field
 Proven 7+ years of experience in software development
 Very good command of English (German is a plus)
 Experience in C# / .NET is a must
 Experience with Node.js, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks (Angular or React) is a must
 Experience with RESTful APIs and relational databases is a must
 Familiarity with Docker and CI/CD pipelines is a plus
 Experience with Java is a plus
 Participation in proof of concepts and system architecture discussions, with the ability to understand complex architectures, is expected
 Experience in industrial automation, IoT, or manufacturing domains is a plus

What We Offer?

Speak up Culture
Respectful Workplace
Being part of a global work environment
Attractive remuneration package
Excellent recognition tools providing spot awards
Learning & Development opportunities for both personal and professional growth 
Leave days for parents and a variety of flexible working models that allow time off for yourself and your family 
Creche allowance for mothers
Share matching programs to become a shareholder of Siemens AG
Remote working and remote living flexibility only for relevant positions
Find more benefits here

Individual benefits are adapted to meet local legal regulations, the requirements of different job profiles, locations, and individual preferences.

“At Siemens we are always challenging ourselves to build a better future. We need the most innovative and diverse Digital Minds to develop tomorrow‘s reality. Find out more about the Digital world of Siemens here: www.siemens.com/careers/digitalminds”

As Siemens we believe physical barriers are not related to potential. Only the potential matters to us. Therefore, we look forward to receive applications of candidates with physical barriers and chronic illnesses. We support healthy relationships between candidates with barriers and their colleagues because we believe we can create differences together.

Siemens is dedicated to quality, equality, and valuating diversity and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities within which we work.

title: Full Stack Developer
details:
Full-Stack Developer (Mid-level)
ERA RF Technologies is a leading innovator in advanced RF communication systems for UAVs and satellite platforms. As we expand our digital infrastructure, we are looking for a Full-Stack Developer to help build the next generation of internal tools, including ERP systems, web dashboards, and software interfaces that interact with real-time hardware environments.
This is an exciting opportunity for software professionals who are passionate about clean architecture, scalable systems, and building solutions that bridge operational workflows with mission-critical technologies.

Key Responsibilities
Take part in the complete architectural and software development processes of the ERP system
Develop modules to digitalize internal business workflows
Build web-based user interfaces that communicate with embedded systems
Design and implement real-time data monitoring, logging, and control dashboards
Contribute to technical documentation, testing, and deployment processes

Required Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or a related field
Minimum of 3 years of professional software development experience
Frontend development experience with modern JavaScript frameworks (preferably React)
Backend development experience within the Node.js ecosystem
Proficient in database design and management (especially SQL-based systems)
Solid understanding of RESTful API design, data flow, and integration
Familiarity with real-time data transmission technologies (e.g., WebSocket)
Experience with offline-first systems, local server-based solutions, and data synchronization strategies
Hands-on experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
Ability to write clean, modular, scalable, and maintainable code

Preferred Qualifications
Experience in ERP, production tracking, inventory management, or admin panel systems
Interest or experience in developing UI for embedded systems projects
Sensitivity to minimalist and user-friendly UI/UX design principles
Strong team player with a proactive and responsible work ethic

What We Offer
The opportunity to contribute to state-of-the-art communication technologies used in critical aerospace and defense platforms
A dynamic, innovation-driven work environment with a culture of collaboration and continuous learning
Competitive compensation and benefits package
A modern and well-equipped office located in Teknopark Istanbul, at the heart of Türkiye’s innovation ecosystem
Wedding, relocation and childbirth support
Energy (heating) assistance
Birthday leave (an additional paid day off)
Comprehensive private health insurance
Complimentary membership to an on-site sports club

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer/Team Lead (Europe Based Start-Up/Remote)
details:
At Nizmara Consulting, we pride ourselves on being the premier destination for executive search and talent acquisition, where excellence meets expertise. With a team of seasoned consultants possessing unparalleled industry knowledge and hands-on experience, we specialize in delivering top-tier talent across a diverse range of verticals including; Technology, Financial Services, Banking & Insurance, Healthcare & Life Sciences, E-commerce & Retail, Construction, Engineering & Manufacturing. We leverage tailored solutions backed by industry insight, exceptional talent, strategic partnerships, and a proven track record of success boosting business outcomes.

A fast-growing, bootstrapped SaaS company is looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer/Team Lead who can grow into a senior management role. The product? A platform that’s digitizing operations for a niche domain — think digital check-ins, extras management, guest communication, and financial tracking — all in one place.
This is not just another dev job. It's a hands-on leadership opportunity where you’ll:
🔧 Own the stack — Laravel/PHP backend and vanilla JS front-end (transitioning to modern frontend)
 🧠 Shape product direction — Work closely with the founder to turn real user feedback into features
 🌱 Mentor and lead — Help junior devs level up and guide engineering standards
 🌊 Build with purpose — The platform is live, profitable, and expanding into new verticals with exciting greenfield opportunities
PS: This is an individual contributor role reporting to the CEO; however, prior leadership experience is essential, as the ideal candidate will be expected to serve as a subject matter expert, driving the commercial strategy and guiding sales, purchasing, and planning teams.

Key Responsibilities:
🔧 Full Stack Development
Design, build, and maintain backend systems using Laravel (PHP)
Work on and improve the current HTML/CSS/vanilla JS frontend
Lead the gradual transition to a modern frontend framework (e.g. Vue.js or React)
Ensure code is maintainable, well-documented, and aligned with long-term product goals
🏗️ Architecture & Technical Decision-Making
Define and implement application architecture and system design
Make key decisions on technologies, frameworks, and scalability strategies
Continuously refactor and improve existing codebases for performance and reliability
Maintain robust API integrations used by our mobile app and external platforms
👥 Team Leadership & Mentorship
Mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and establish development best practices
Manage small internal or external development teams, aligning tasks with company priorities
Help build a strong engineering culture based on ownership, collaboration, and continuous learning
🎯 Product & Strategic Input
Collaborate closely with the founder and business stakeholders to translate product vision into executable technical plans
Take customer feedback and convert it into actionable, high-impact features
Contribute to long-term product roadmap discussions, especially in adjacent product verticals
🚀 Process & Standards
Define and enforce coding standards, version control, deployment, and CI/CD practices
Monitor system health and implement observability practices (e.g., via Sentry, CloudWatch)
Ensure security best practices are followed throughout the development lifecycle

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Hold a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field
Have 6+ years of full-stack experience, especially with Laravel and PHP
Can work across the stack — from HTML/CSS/JS to AWS infrastructure
Know your way around modern frontend frameworks (Vue.js or React)
Are product-minded: you don’t just write code, you think about what and why
Thrive in remote, agile environments where autonomy and ownership matter
🌟 Bonus points for:
Experience integrating with travel platforms like Airbnb or Booking.com
Background in AI/ML applications (content gen, pricing intel, user insights)
Comfort with web scraping or browser automation
Exposure to investor-facing work, accelerators, or early-stage startup scaling
Tech Stack: Laravel, HTML/CSS/JS (migrating to modern frontend), MySQL, AWS (EC2, RDS, S3), Docker, GitHub, Sentry, Expo, Jira

title: Engineering Manager - Web
details:
Canonical is a leading provider of open-source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of globally distributed collaboration, with 1100+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office-based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

The company is founder-led, profitable and growing.

We are hiring a Web Engineering Manager to work collaboratively with many teams and roles across the organisation including product managers and other engineering teams to deliver reliable, scalable and delightful user experiences for users of Canonical products.

As an Engineering Manager at Canonical, your primary responsibility is to the people you support: ensuring that they are growing as web engineers, doing valuable work, and generally having a great time at Canonical. As a lead for strong engineers, technical leadership and a solid background in web development is a must so that you're able to challenge and grow your team members. You will have the opportunity to influence the culture, facilitate technical delivery, and work with your team on strategy and execution.

Location: This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.

The role entails

Demonstrate sound engineering principles by directly contributing to your team's goals
Estimate work, set goals, and meet them
Design and implement well-tested and documented software in Web technologies or Flutter.
Debug and fix issues encountered by your users
Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural reviews
Collaborate with community and colleagues on technical specifications
Contribute to technical documentation to make it the best of its kind
Seek improvements to engineering and operations practices
Deploy and operate services developed by the team
Contribute to the success of your product through technical advocacy

What we are looking for in you

You are knowledgeable and passionate about web and software development
You value soft skills and are passionate, enterprising, thoughtful, and self-motivated
An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
Drive and a track record of going above and beyond expectations
Well-organised, self-starting and able to deliver to schedule
Professional manner in interacting with colleagues, partners, and community
Experience designing and writing high-quality Web technologies
Experience with and passion for Typescript, React or Flutter
An eye for accessibility and performance
Professional written and spoken English
Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
Passion, thoughtfulness, and self-motivation
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
Ability to travel twice a year, for company events for up to two weeks each

Nice-to-have skills

Experience with container tech such as LXD, Docker and Kubernetes
Experience building and maintaining a talented team
REST API design, development and governance
Performance engineering and security experience

What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.

Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
Annual compensation review
Recognition rewards
Annual holiday leave
Maternity and paternity leave
Employee Assistance Programme
Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long-haul company events

About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal-opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background creates a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Procurement Specialist
details:
Decathlon is the world's largest sports retailer which was founded in 1976, in France. Our Mission is ‘’to sustainably make the pleasure and benefits of sports accessible to the many’’ across the globe.

As Decathlon Turkey, aligned with our global mission, we keep on growing with more than 40 stores and online businesses.

In the high-paced dynamic environment of Decathlon Turkey, we are now looking for a Procurement Specialist!

You will join our Procurement Team and will be responsible for the related process models.

If you are;
Living towards the value of sport and Decathlon values “Vitality and Responsibility, Authenticity & Generosity”
Passionate about purchasing and supply chain activities

We are waiting for your application!

Who are you?

Sportive.
Energetic.
Responsible.
Authentic & Generous.
A Team player.

What are we looking for?

A teammate who;

Is passionate about procurement,
Has a Bachelor's Degree,
Has an excellent command of written and spoken English,
Has had 1-2 years of related work experience, preferably in the retail sector,
Has strong communication skills,
Has an analytical mindset,
Has good problem-solving skills,
Has a high level of adaptability to dynamic environments
Is concrete and reactive,
Is user and customer-oriented,
Is able to cope with the challenge,
Is able to analyze risks to make good decisions, result-oriented,
Is mobile to travel in Turkey and abroad.

What are your responsibilities?

Responsible for procurement operations within the MEA zone.
Create & implement the procurement policy for hard/soft processes to define long-term sharing with the suppliers,
Manage 2 years of tactical planning and strategy to secure the best procurement package,
Guarantee the best supply package; ensure availability and the best price of the models all year,
Decide the best supply scheme and supply method for the best procurement solutions to cover business needs,
Validate S&OP agreement and adapt during the season/years according to business needs,
Manage supply performances of all the models and find alternative supply solutions in case of any production constraint,
Anticipate forecast uncertainty and/or production constraints, react to events during the season/year,
Maintain data quality on procurement,
Define the commercial needs and transfer them into the industrial answer.



*Under the Personal Data Protection Law,
You can access the Employee Candidate Enlightenment Text from the link below.

Çalışan Adayı Aydınlatma Metni’ne aşağıdaki linkten ulaşabilirsiniz.

Shipready olarak Türkiye merkezli uluslararası e-ticaret lojistik çözümleri sunan bir 3PL lojistik ve teknoloji şirketiyiz. Amazon, Etsy, eBay, Shopify gibi global platformlarla entegre çalışan sistemler geliştiriyoruz;

* Kod kalitesine ve temiz kod prensiplerine önem veren
* Versiyon kontrol sistemleri (Git) ve temel yazılım geliştirme süreçlerine hakim

Location: This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.

The role entails

Demonstrate sound engineering principles by directly contributing to your team's goals
Estimate work, set goals, and meet them
Design and implement well-tested and documented software in Web technologies or Flutter.
Debug and fix issues encountered by your users
Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural reviews
Collaborate with community and colleagues on technical specifications
Contribute to technical documentation to make it the best of its kind
Seek improvements to engineering and operations practices
Deploy and operate services developed by the team
Contribute to the success of your product through technical advocacy

What we are looking for in you

You are knowledgeable and passionate about web and software development
You value soft skills and are passionate, enterprising, thoughtful, and self-motivated
An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
Drive and a track record of going above and beyond expectations
Well-organised, self-starting and able to deliver to schedule
Professional manner in interacting with colleagues, partners, and community
Experience designing and writing high-quality Web technologies
Experience with and passion for Typescript, React or Flutter
An eye for accessibility and performance
Professional written and spoken English
Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
Passion, thoughtfulness, and self-motivation
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
Ability to travel twice a year, for company events for up to two weeks each

Nice-to-have skills

Experience with container tech such as LXD, Docker and Kubernetes
Experience building and maintaining a talented team
REST API design, development and governance
Performance engineering and security experience

What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.

Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
Annual compensation review
Recognition rewards
Annual holiday leave
Maternity and paternity leave
Employee Assistance Programme
Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long-haul company events

About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal-opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background creates a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

title: SENIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
details:
Turkcell olarak yeteneklerimize eşsiz insan deneyimi yaşatarak, değer yaratan sürdürülebilir bir organizasyon inşa etmeyi ve işveren markamızı zirveye taşımayı hedefliyoruz. Bu hedef doğrultusunda benimsediğimiz değerlerimizi iş yapış biçimlerimize yansıtıyoruz.

Turkcell’de Neye Değer Veriyoruz?
İnsan Odaklılık: Eşsiz insan deneyimi oluşturmak amacıyla uygulamalarımızın merkezinde insanı konumluyor, çalışanlarımızın potansiyelini en üst düzeye çıkarmayı ve onların yeteneklerini geliştirmeyi hedefliyoruz.
Yenilik: İnsanların hayatında fark yaratan yenilikçi çözümler üretmek, fikir ve teknolojileri keşfetmek için tutkulu bir şekilde çalışıyoruz. 🚀
Mükemmellik: Dahil olduğumuz ve temas ettiğimiz her noktada mükemmelliyeti hedefliyor, kendimize yüksek standartlar belirliyor, olağanüstü sonuçlar elde ediyoruz. 🎯👌🏼
İş Birliği: Başarının anahtarı olarak birlikte çalışmayı, saygı ve şeffaflık kültürünü teşvik ediyoruz. 👥🔗🧩
Müşteri Odaklılık: Müşterilerimizin ihtiyaçlarını merkeze koyarak olağanüstü müşteri deneyimleri sunmayı hedefliyoruz. 🤝🖇️
Sürdürülebilirlik: Müşterilerimiz, çalışanlarımız ve dünyamız için sürdürülebilir bir gelecek amacıyla çalışıyoruz. 🌍

Ne Bekliyoruz?
Mühendislik fakültelerinin Bilgisayar, Yazılım Mühendisliği bölümlerinden mezun,
Minimum 10 yıl yazılım geliştirme deneyimi,
Agile, Scrum, Kanban metodolojileriyle proje yönetimi pratiğine sahip,
Mentorluk, teknik karar süreçlerinde yön verici olma,
Sonuç odaklı, yaratıcı, araştırmacı, problem çözme ve raporlama konusunda başarılı,
Dijital teknolojilere hakim ve bu teknolojileri kullanarak yaratıcı çözümler üretebilen,
Farklı disiplinlerle (ürün, tasarım, veri bilimi, müşteri) etkili iletişim ve koordinasyon becerisi,
Analitik düşünebilen, çözüm ve müşteri odaklı,
İyi seviyede İngilizce bilen,
Etkin zaman yönetimi yapabilen.


Turkcell’de Senir Software Developer Rolü Ne Yapar?
Python, Java, Node.js veya C# dillerinden en az birinde ileri seviye uzmanlığı olan,
Sıfırdan tasarlanan bir sistemin mimarisini planlamış, ekipleri teknik olarak yönlendirmiş ve bu platformun sürdürülebilirliğini sağlamış/yapmış,
React Native, Flutter, Swift veya Kotlin gibi teknolojilerle mobil uygulama geliştirme bilgisi olan,
Yapay zeka projelerinde deneyim: NLP, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM, Prophet ve benzeri kütüphanelerle yoğun çalışma yapmış,
Pandas, NumPy, Statsmodels ile istatistiksel analiz ve veri ön işleme becerisi olan,
Mikroservis mimarisi, domain-driven design (DDD), event-driven architecture gibi modern sistem tasarımı yaklaşımlarında derin bilgisi olan,
RESTful ve GraphQL API tasarımı ve uygulaması yapmış,
Docker, Kubernetes konteyner mimarileri yönetimi yapabilen,
İlişkisel veritabanlarında (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL) veri modelleme, performans optimizasyonu ve gelişmiş sorgulama bilgisi olan,
NoSQL veritabanlarında (MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra, DynamoDB) tasarım, ölçekleme ve replikasyon stratejilerinde tecrübe sahibi,
CI/CD süreçlerinin tasarımı ve Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD gibi araçlarla entegrasyonunda bilgi ve tecrübe sahibi,
Test otomasyonu, kalite güvence, kod güvenliği alanlarında derin bilgisi olan,
Yazılım yaşam döngüsünün tüm safhalarında aktif görev almış olan (analiz, geliştirme, test, dağıtım ve bakım),
Versiyonlama, rollback, canary release, blue/green deployment gibi ileri dağıtım stratejilerine hâkim,
Monitoring ve observability araçlarında deneyim sahibi (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, Datadog vb.)

Yan Haklar ve Faydalar
Ekibimizin bir üyesi olarak, rekabetçi bir ücret, esnek çalışma düzenlemeleri, kariyer gelişimi ve ilerleme fırsatları gibi bir dizi yan hak ve fayda ile buluşma fırsatı yakalayacaksın. Detaylara "https://bit.ly/TurkcellTKusagi’’ üzerinden ulaşabilirsin. 🎁▶️

*Turkcell bir eşit fırsat işverenidir ve ırka, renge, dine, cinsiyete, ulusal kökene, etnik kökene, yaşa, fiziksel görünüşe veya duruma, medeni durumuna, askerlik durumuna bakılmaksızın, tüm nitelikli başvuru sahiplerini istihdam için değerlendirmeye alır.

title: Back-End Developer
details:
Medsien is the leading provider of scalable remote care management for a quality patient experience. Hundreds of organizations trust Medsien's unparalleled technology solutions to implement exceptional remote care management programs, personalize every interaction, and improve the lives of the people who need it most. Based in San Francisco and venture-backed by top-tier investors, Medsien was founded to reimagine remote care management.

More than 60% of all U.S. adults—over 150 million people—live with at least one chronic condition, which requires dedicated, ongoing medical support outside the four walls of their doctor's office. And yet, only 20% of these patients have access to remote care from the comfort of their homes, putting their health at significant risk. Together, we can save lives and create a real impact.

Medsien is a venture-backed healthcare SaaS company experiencing rapid growth and looking to expand our team. We are seeking organized, motivated, and passionate Back-End Developers to join our team of talented and inspiring developers in a fast-paced environment.

As a Back-End Developer, you'll work on new exciting projects with full autonomy. We're looking for a candidate who is passionate about building new applications from the ground up and who will join a growing team in developing the products that enable providers to provide high quality services to their patients.

As a Back-End Developer, you will:

Implement and document new software apps and components,
Understand how code fits into broader technical and/or business contexts,
Actively participate in code review and technical design reviews,
Work on medium to large projects. Participate in all system/component implementation and design from development to production,
Research new technologies and prototype new ideas,
Ensure high testability and quality of delivered software,
Work with the Operations team to troubleshoot and fix defects in software,
Participate in building Scrum processes and agile culture within the company.

Please apply if you have:

3+ years of back-end development experience,
Having worked in a dynamic, agile environment with minimal supervision,
Extensive experience with Python/Django,
A creative and driven mindset with experience navigating through ambiguity and a desire to work in a fast-paced, results-driven environment,
A desire to learn and try new approaches/ ideas and stretch boundaries,
Extreme problem solving skills,
Superb communication skills,
Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, or a related field of study,
Perfect English skills; both written and oral,
Accomodation in Istanbul city center.

For this position, we offer:

competitive USD salary and stock options,
Flexible vacation and PTO policies,
Fully remote work opportunities, 
Training, mentorship, and coaching from leadership. 

Please bear in mind that:

This is a permanent-term contractor job opportunity with Medsien Inc. 
Candidates living outside of Istanbul city center will be automatically eliminated from the process. 
All interviews will be conducted in English and the candidates having less than advanced level of English will be directly eliminated from the process regardless of their technical skills and expertise.

If you have been selected as a short-listed candidate, we will contact you for a short screening call to get to know you better. If you don't get a call, please don't be disappointed! We receive many applications for each role and must prioritize who we speak to.

Employment at Medsien is based solely on a person's merit and qualifications. title: Consultant - Organisational Strategy
details:
About Us

Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help clients synchronize strategy and talent to drive superior performance. We work with organizations to design their structures, roles, and responsibilities. We help them hire the right people to bring their strategy to life. And we advise them on how to reward, develop, and motivate their people.

Our 10,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries. We offer five core solutions:

Organizational Strategy
Assessment and Succession
Talent Acquisition
Leadership Development
Total Rewards

Job Description

About Organizational Strategy

Technology. Customers. Markets. They are all changing faster than ever. And businesses are transforming to keep up or keep ahead. Auto brands are selling services, not just cars. Manufacturers are selling data, not just products. Some businesses are pushing into new territories, others are merging. No sector is immune.

Korn Ferry’s Organizational Strategy team provides end to end support to organizations who want to transform their business. We help them translate their strategy into something they can operationalize, by aligning both the tangible elements of the organization - people, structure and process - and the intangible elements - motivations, relationships and culture. This enables us to anticipate and react to evolving markets, drive true behavioural and organizational change - and make it stick.

At Korn Ferry We Work With Leaders To First Clarify Their Strategy, Then Cascade The Results Into An Operating Model, Organizational Structure And Processes. We Leverage Industry-leading Tools And Methodologies And Work Collaboratively With Leadership To

Align leaders around a shared and compelling purpose.

Clarify the strategy so it's fit-for-purpose and can be implemented.

Develop an operating model that manages competing priorities and ensures that everything the business does adds value to the bottom line.

Design a detailed organizational structure that aligns with the operating model and focuses people on doing the right things.

Develop effective governance processes that help the organization work.

Purpose of the Position

To deliver organizational strategy, including operating model design, detailed organizational structure design and to be able to develop effective governance processes, as part of project teams, for a variety of clients and industries. At the Principal Levels, Consultants will be involved in more complex or custom solutions to drive real business value to the client.

Key Responsibilities

Help organizations to navigate and implement organizational change and identify opportunities for improvement through assessing organizational structures using analytical tools and techniques.

Identify, quantify and support delivery of the financial and non-financial benefits of organizational design, being able to manage small projects and/or a work-stream within a larger project.

May have more substantive conversations with client contacts at manager level and below to explain information provided, clarify requests for information, etc.

Begin to develop client network, proactively reaching out to clients and prospects to discuss issues and needs and forming productive relationships. May be the primary contact for small clients and/or projects.

Participate in sales and client planning activities at smaller organizations.

Support business development by contributing to new business proposals and presentations and taking a role in industry and account teams.

Identify trends, collate and distribute industry research/analysis as well as enhance your understanding of client and sector issues.

The Candidate

Experience And Professional Qualifications

Typically, a relevant first (Master’s) degree with several years’ (2-5 years) relevant work experience in organizational design, preferably in professional services, transformation or other related role (e.g. internal consultant).

Experience working independently to apply organizational design methods and tools to address client needs.

Capable of drafting full project deliverables for review by a lead consultant.

Able to identify the steps required for a typical organizational design project and understand the interrelationship of different streams of work in a larger project.

Able to execute standard protocols and customize the approach when appropriate, with input and approval from subject matter experts in the firm.

Has developed and maintains a general knowledge and understanding of clients and industries to understand the basic drivers of business effectiveness and typical business models.

Skills And Competencies

Strong analytical and project management skills.

Excellent facilitation, communication and data analysis skills.

Ability to build excellent client relationships.

Ability to look at the bigger picture as well as have a keen eye for detail.

Creative and resolutive approach to problem solving.

Entrepreneurial spirit and curiosity to learn about new businesses, sector trends and solutions.

Fluency in PowerPoint and Excel. Experience of using organizational analytical tools (e.g. OrgVue, Dynaplan) is desired.

Internal Mobility at Korn Ferry

If you currently work for Korn Ferry or one of our affiliates, you must be eligible to apply for a different position within Korn Ferry to use the Careers Site. If you accept such a position, your benefits programs and Human Resources policies may change. Please consult with your HR contact for the new position concerning application eligibility, including any immigration/visa needs, benefit programs, and HR policies applicable to that position.

Korn Ferry is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, age, or veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law.

title: Senior Product Designer
details:
About the Role

We’re looking for a Senior Product Designer with deep expertise in design systems to join our product design team. In this role, you’ll take ownership of building, maintaining, and scaling our design system and component library. You will work closely with product, engineering, and brand teams to ensure a consistent, efficient, and accessible experience across web and mobile platforms. Additionally, you will play a key role in shaping the overall product vision by balancing user needs with business goals.


Qualifications:

4+ years of experience in product design, preferably with a focus on design systems and UI architecture,
Advanced proficiency in Figma (components, variants, auto-layout, tokens, etc.),
Solid experience designing for mobile apps and responsive web platforms,
Hands-on experience in building or expanding design systems from scratch or scaling existing ones,
Strong collaboration skills with developers and ability to bridge the gap between design and code,
Excellent grasp of visual hierarchy, typography, color theory, and layout systems,
Ability to think user-first while understanding business constraints and priorities,
Strong communication and documentation skills,
A portfolio showcasing design system and product design work is required.


Responsibilities:

Design System & UI Standardization
Build, document, and maintain a robust design system and component library to ensure consistency across products,
Define design principles, component behaviors, naming conventions, guidelines, and accessibility standards,
Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure pixel-perfect, responsive, and accessible implementation of UI components,
Promote system thinking across product and design teams and drive adoption of the system,
Plan for scalability by extending the design system as new features, platforms, or products emerge.

Senior Product Design Ownership
Translate product goals and user needs into elegant, intuitive, and scalable user experiences,
Design user flows, interaction patterns, and wireframes that simplify complex problems,
Align design strategy with business priorities to influence product direction,
Justify design decisions using data, user insights, and business reasoning,
Ensure visual quality and consistency across all touchpoints.

Team Collaboration & Mentorship
Mentor other designers, share knowledge, and contribute to the team’s overall design maturity,
Actively participate in design critiques and give constructive feedback,.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams such as product managers, engineers, data analysts, and marketing specialists.


Nice to Have

Experience with implementing design systems in code or working alongside front-end teams (React, Flutter, etc.),
Previous experience in sports, betting, gaming, or digital entertainment platforms is a plus.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
details:
ABOUT Jotform

Jotform is a San Francisco-based SaaS company with more than 30 million users worldwide. We are thriving and growing, and we’ve never needed outside funding. That’s because we like keeping things agile, independent and fun. Jotform believes everyone should be able to create their own online forms. Our 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations and more than 380 widgets have made us one of the most popular online form builders for organizations of all sizes — from small businesses to enterprises.

Since our inception in 2006, our mission has been to help users create, manage and share online forms and receive responses in the easiest way possible.

ABOUT THE ROLE

Jotform is seeking a Senior Frontend Developer in our İstanbul office, located at a relaxed fun environment in Vadistanbul. As a rapidly growing company we are hiring for similar positions continuously and once an opportunity matches with your qualifications, we will contact you immediately.

Here’s what you will be doing:

Developing cross-browser, cross-platform compatible solutions
Developing scalable, reliable, maintainable and reusable code
Delivering solutions in a continuous integration flow to live system having 30 million users
Testing your code and solutions with A/B tests and/or via feedbacks from the user testing services
Working closely with product management, back-end developers, DevOps and designers
Coming up with ideas to improve user experience and openly sharing them with the team
Attending hackathons with utmost passion to try new things

Education & Work Experience & Technical Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in CS/CENG or in a related technical field or equivalent practical experience
Deep knowledge of ReactJS, Redux and NodeJS
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, AJAX
5+ years experience in building web applications
Working experience with CI/CD and related tools like Git and Jenkins
Preferably experience in SaaS
Excellent command of English
Superior communication and interpersonal skills
A passion to learn and keep up with the cutting edge technologies
Ability to write high-performance, maintainable and reusable code
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

Jotform PERKS

High growth-paced environment with collaborative and unique team culture
Generous market competitive total compensation package
Health Insurance
Professional Growth & Career Opportunities: We support your personal and professional development with educational materials and expenses & relevant conferences abroad to stay up to date with the latest industry trends & online courses or coaching - and support you pursuing ones that you are passionate about!
Challenging projects, regular feedback, healthy competition
Fun & Relax working environment: When we’re in the office; music, jeans and t-shirts are the norm & kitchens stocked with healthy & tasty snacks & drinks

OUR PROCESS

We’ll review your application along with all the others we receive and pick the top profiles for a screening call. In many cases due to time constraints and our candidate volume, only the short-listed candidates are contacted but we do consider each application carefully. If you have been selected as a short-listed candidate, we will contact you for a short screening call to get to know you better. If you don’t get a call, please don’t be disappointed! We receive many applications for each role and have to prioritize who we speak to.

Thank you for taking the time to apply for a position at Jotform!

Jotform is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Full Stack Developer (.NET, React)
details:
Şirket Profili


Kuveyt Türk Katılım Bankası’nın %100 iştiraki olarak 2015 yılından beri dijital ürün ve hizmetler geliştiren Architecht, bilişim sektöründe faaliyet gösteriyor. Açık bankacılık, ana bankacılık, tedarikçi finansmanı, güvenlik teknolojileri, alternatif kanal çözümleri, yazılım geliştirme, destek ve danışmanlık hizmetleri sunan şirket, bankalar, telekomünikasyon şirketleri, teknoloji şirketleri ve bireysel emeklilik şirketleri gibi geniş bir yelpazede finansal çözümler sağlıyor. Kuruluşunun ilk yılında Türkiye’nin ilk 500 büyük şirketi arasına giren, 2019 yılında Türkiye’nin en hızlı büyüyen teknoloji şirketi olan ve bugün 700’ü aşkın çalışanı ile finansal teknolojiler geliştiren Architecht, Great Place to Work® Sertifikasyon programına göre son 6 yıldır Türkiye’nin En İyi İşverenleri arasında yer alıyor.

Değerlendirme Süreci

Bu ilan için yapılan başvurulara dönüşler https://join.architecht.com/ platformu üzerinden yapılacaktır.

Aranan Nitelikler:

Lisans veya yüksek lisans derecesi Mühendislik, Bilgisayar Bilimleri veya eşdeğer deneyim,
En az 3 yıldan fazla full-stack geliştirme deneyimi,
React, JavaScript ve Node.js ile çalışma deneyimi,
Modern Javascript Frameworkleri hakkında bilgi sahibi ( Angular, VueJS, vb),
Sağlam, ölçeklenebilir, sürdürülebilir ve yüksek kaliteli web uygulamaları oluşturma deneyimi,
Bileşen kitaplıkları mimarisinde deneyimli, yeniden kullanılabilir kullanıcı arayüzü bileşenleri oluşturmada deneyimli,
Tasarımsal bakış açısına sahip,
C# ve .NET Framework ile backend geliştirme deneyimi,
Uygulama mimarisi konusunda deneyimli,
Kapsamlı MSSQL bilgisi,
Kubernetes ve docker platformalarında uygulama geliştirmiş, cloud teknolojileri ile ilgili tecrübesi olan,
Mükemmel problem çözme becerileri ve hem bağımsız çalışabilme hem de takım içinde işbirliği yapabilme becerisi,
Hızlı tempolu bir işyerinde iletişim kurma ve çalışma yeteneği,
Sözlü ve yazılı İngilizce iletişimde akıcılık,
Tercihen Microfrontend mimarisi hakkında bilgi ve deneyim sahibi olan,
Tercihen Webpack, Gulp, babel gibi araçlar hakkında bilgisi ve tecrübesi olan, Git,TFS kullanımına hakim olan,
Tercihen CI/CD yöntem ve araçlarında bilgili,
Tercihen Yapay Zeka, ChatGPT, LowCode-NoCode konularına ilgili ve tecrübesi olan,
Tercihen IOS ve Android konularında bilgi sahibi,
Tercihen bilişim ve Bankacılık sektöründe yazılım geliştirme projelerinde süreç, analiz ve test çalışmalarında en az 4 yıl deneyimli.

İş Tanımı:

React, JavaScript ve Node.js gibi modern web teknolojileriyle çalışarak, kullanıcı dostu ve etkileyici web uygulamaları oluşturma,
C# ve .NET Framework kullanarak, ölçeklenebilir, güvenli ve yüksek kaliteli backend sistemlerinin tasarım ve geliştirme süreçlerine katkı sağlama,
Uygulama mimarisi konusunda deneyim sahibi olarak, sistem bileşenlerini uygun bir şekilde tasarlama, entegrasyonu gerçekleştirme ve kod kalitesini sağlama,
HTML, CSS ve diğer web teknolojilerini kullanarak, kullanıcı arayüzlerinin tasarım ve geliştirme süreçlerine katkı sağlama,
Veri tabanı yönetimi konusunda kapsamlı bilgiye sahip olarak, MSSQL veritabanlarının etkin bir şekilde yönetimi ve veri manipülasyonu
Docker ve diğer DevOps araçlarıyla aşina olarak, uygulamaların hızlı, güvenli ve yüksek kaliteli bir şekilde dağıtımına katkıda bulunma,
Hızlı ve tempolu bir ortamda çalışarak, proje teslim tarihlerine uyum sağlama ve etkili iletişim kurma.

details:

 5+ years of experience with React Native (experience with version 0.70+ is a must)

title: Engineering Manager - Web
details:
Canonical is a leading provider of open-source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of globally distributed collaboration, with 1100+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office-based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

The company is founder-led, profitable and growing.

We are hiring a Web Engineering Manager to work collaboratively with many teams and roles across the organisation including product managers and other engineering teams to deliver reliable, scalable and delightful user experiences for users of Canonical products.

As an Engineering Manager at Canonical, your primary responsibility is to the people you support: ensuring that they are growing as web engineers, doing valuable work, and generally having a great time at Canonical. As a lead for strong engineers, technical leadership and a solid background in web development is a must so that you're able to challenge and grow your team members. You will have the opportunity to influence the culture, facilitate technical delivery, and work with your team on strategy and execution.

Location: This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.

The role entails

Demonstrate sound engineering principles by directly contributing to your team's goals
Estimate work, set goals, and meet them
Design and implement well-tested and documented software in Web technologies or Flutter.
Debug and fix issues encountered by your users
Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural reviews
Collaborate with community and colleagues on technical specifications
Contribute to technical documentation to make it the best of its kind
Seek improvements to engineering and operations practices
Deploy and operate services developed by the team
Contribute to the success of your product through technical advocacy

What we are looking for in you

You are knowledgeable and passionate about web and software development
You value soft skills and are passionate, enterprising, thoughtful, and self-motivated
An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
Drive and a track record of going above and beyond expectations
Well-organised, self-starting and able to deliver to schedule
Professional manner in interacting with colleagues, partners, and community
Experience designing and writing high-quality Web technologies
Experience with and passion for Typescript, React or Flutter
An eye for accessibility and performance
Professional written and spoken English
Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
Passion, thoughtfulness, and self-motivation
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
Ability to travel twice a year, for company events for up to two weeks each

Nice-to-have skills

Experience with container tech such as LXD, Docker and Kubernetes
Experience building and maintaining a talented team
REST API design, development and governance
Performance engineering and security experience

What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.

Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
Annual compensation review
Recognition rewards
Annual holiday leave
Maternity and paternity leave
Employee Assistance Programme
Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long-haul company events

About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal-opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background creates a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Part-time Software Development Engineer (Cloud)
details:
About the Program;

Our program is designed to complement the studies, helping the students gain valuable skills and experience within Siemens, build up a network by working at challenging software development projects and sharing thoughts and ideas among each other and with Siemens employees.

During the whole time a mentor will guide the student through the program, offering advice, feedback and support, to give our students the best start in the industry.

During the program participants will be challenged with:

 Designing, developing, and testing software for Siemens’s products and platforms dedicated for industrial automation, industrial IoT, cloud and edge computing solutions.
 Working in a multi-site, multi-national and contemporary software development environment
 Producing high quality project deliverables
 Conforming to Siemens processes, quality standards, and guidelines

To apply for the Program, you need to;

 Willing to follow software engineering and/or test automation engineering career path.
 Good command of English.
 Minimum 2,5 days/week availability is expected (partly remote working).
 Eager to learn Industrial Automation domain know-how.
 Hands-on programming skills and knowledge in one of the programming languages (.Net, Python, Node.js, React) is a must .
 Knowledge of source control tools (e.g. Git, etc) is a plus.
 Studied on digital signal processing topic is a big plus.

What we offer:

We offer a completely new form of learning, letting the students build solutions to real problems and develop a deep insight into a career with us.

 You will start an international career by being responsible for designing, coding, testing, documenting, and supporting our software products.
 You will learn key skills like teamwork and project development as they work in global project teams – making valuable friends and contacts in the process.
 You will get advice and guidance from mentors with a mix of on-site events, virtual training modules and guided reflection sessions.
 You will actively gain experience in agile working environment while being empowered by agile trainings.

Application Process:

 Online Application: We will accept applications until 30th June
 Screening & Assessments:

Stage 1) If you are among the candidates selected for the next phase, you’ll be invited to video interview.

Stage 2) Technical Interview: Based on your qualifications, you’ll be invited to technical interview where you will meet people from different projects.

Stage 3) P&O Interview: Based on our technical manager’s evaluations, you will be invited to meet our People and Organization Team for competency-based Interview.

Selection:

If you’re selected, you will be informed and offered a part-time position contract.

Individual benefits are adapted to meet local legal regulations, the requirements of different job profiles, locations, and individual preferences.

“At Siemens we are always challenging ourselves to build a better future. We need the most innovative and diverse Digital Minds to develop tomorrow‘s reality. Find out more about the Digital world of Siemens here: www.siemens.com/careers/digitalminds”

As Siemens we believe physical barriers are not related to potential. Only the potential matters to us. Therefore, we look forward to receive applications of candidates with physical barriers and chronic illnesses. We support healthy relationships between candidates with barriers and their colleagues because we believe we can create differences together.

Siemens is dedicated to quality, equality, and valuating diversity and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities within which we work.

We are looking forward to receiving your online application. Please ensure you complete all areas of the application form to the best of you ability as we will use the data to review your suitability to the role.
