title: Senior UI Developer
details:
ABOUT Jotform

Jotform is a San Francisco-based SaaS company with more than 30 million users worldwide. We are thriving and growing, and we’ve never needed outside funding. That’s because we like keeping things agile, independent and fun. Jotform believes everyone should be able to create their own online forms. Our 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations and more than 380 widgets have made us one of the most popular online form builders for organizations of all sizes — from small businesses to enterprises.

Since our inception in 2006, our mission has been to help users create, manage and share online forms and receive responses in the easiest way possible.

ABOUT THE ROLE

As a rapidly growing company, Jotform is seeking a Senior UI Developer in our İzmir office, located at a relaxed fun environment in Teknopark İzmir.

Here’s what you will be doing:

Developing HTML, CSS and basic interactions of UI designs
Developing HTML email templates
Developing cross-browser, cross-platform compatible solutions
Developing scalable, reliable, maintainable and reusable code
Delivering solutions in a continuous integration flow to production having 30 million users
Testing your code and solutions with A/B tests and/or via feedbacks from the user testing services
Working with designers and front end developers to implement prototypes
Coming up with ideas to improve user experience and openly sharing them with the team
Attending hackathons with utmost passion to try new things

Education & Work Experience & Technical Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in CS/CENG or in a related technical field or equivalent practical experience
Proficiency in HTML, CSS3
5+ year experience building web applications
Experience with CSS preprocessors (LESS, SASS)
Experience in responsive UI development
Developing cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions
Good understanding of browser-rendering and browser animation costs
Excellent command of English
A passion to learn and keep up with the cutting edge technologies
Demonstrated ability to work independently with minimal supervision
Experience with popular JavaScript frameworks (i.e. React, Node.js and Backbone.js) is a plus
Experience in SaaS is a plus
Experience with HTML email template development is a plus

Jotform PERKS

High growth-paced environment with collaborative and unique team culture
Generous market competitive total compensation package
Health Insurance
Professional Growth & Career Opportunities: We support your personal and professional development with educational materials and expenses & relevant conferences abroad to stay up to date with the latest industry trends & online courses or coaching - and support you pursuing ones that you are passionate about!
Challenging projects, regular feedback, healthy competition
Fun & Relax working environment: When we’re in the office; music, jeans and t-shirts are the norm & kitchens stocked with healthy & tasty snacks & drinks

OUR PROCESS

We’ll review your application along with all the others we receive and pick the top profiles for a screening call. In many cases due to time constraints and our candidate volume, only the short-listed candidates are contacted but we do consider each application carefully. If you have been selected as a short-listed candidate, we will contact you for a short screening call to get to know you better. If you don’t get a call, please don’t be disappointed! We receive many applications for each role and have to prioritize who we speak to.

Thank you for taking the time to apply for a position at Jotform!

Jotform is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Assistant Restaurant Manager
details:
Company Description

"Why work for Accor?

We are far more than a worldwide leader. We welcome you as you are and you can find a job and brand that matches your personality. We support you to grow and learn every day, making sure that work brings purpose to your life, so that during your journey with us, you can continue to explore Accor’s limitless possibilities.

By joining Accor, every chapter of your story is yours to write and together we can imagine tomorrow's hospitality. Discover the life that awaits you at Accor, visit https://careers.accor.com/

Do what you love, care for the world, dare to challenge the status quo! #BELIMITLESS"

As soon as you step inside The Grand Tarabya Managed by Accor, which holds a very special place in Istanbul's history, you will feel the charm of a 100-years-old past, the highest architectural and aesthetic standards, and the splendor inspired by the sparkle of the Bosphorus. From the 4.500 square meter spa area to the panoramic Bosphorus view of 29 residences and 248 rooms, from the magnificent 1.280 square meter ballroom to the restaurants and bars offering an unforgettable gastronomic adventure, The Grand Tarabya Managed by Accor, combines care, elegance, and comfort in every detail. With its doors opening to the Bosphorus, The Grand Tarabya Managed by Accor, will forever hold its place in your memory.

Job Description

At The Grand Tarabya Managed by Accor, exceptional service and flavors are the hallmarks of every dining experience. We invite you to develop your leadership strengths as an Assistant Restaurant Manager – and let your passion for guest service drive consistent guest satisfaction, an engaged team and outstanding operating results.

Your Job Duties Include

Help lead the F&B Outlet team in all aspects of the department and ensure service standards are followed
Handle guest concerns and react quickly and professionally
Balance operational, administrative and Colleague needs
Maximize revenues by communicating regularly with the Food and Beverage teams to implement agreed upon strategies, practices and promotions
Supervise and support of employees while ensuring service standards are maintained
Help with recruit, train, manage, mentor, lead and develop your supervisors and colleagues
Have full knowledge of all Outlet menus
Other duties as assigned

Qualifications

Your Skills & Qualifications:

Must have 2 years previous experience as a Leader in Food & Beverage; preferably in a full service hotel or upscale restaurant
Diploma or Degree in Hospitality/Hotel Administration an asset
Strong interpersonal and problem-solving abilities with a service-focused personality
Flexibility to work various shifts, including early mornings, late nights, weekends, and holidays
The willingness to learn and be constantly challenged to grow with the restaurant team.
An appreciation for detail and a passion for guest service.
A professional and positive attitude in every aspect of the position.
Consistent punctuality and dedication.
A calm, polite and composed demeanor.

Additional Information

Your Team And Working Environment

We support you to grow and learn every day, making sure that work brings purpose to your life, so that during your journey with us, you can continue to explore Accor’s limitless possibilities.

Note: Customization may be included for any specific local or legislative requirements, such as work permits.

Our Commitment To Diversity & Inclusion

We are an inclusive company and our ambition is to attract, recruit and promote diverse talent.

title: Backend Developer (Node.js / Remote)
details:
Join our team at Atolye15 and experience the freedom to work remotely from wherever you are. Once you are a part of us, you'll collaborate side by side with highly talented and experienced product developers, participate in significant global projects that promise international growth, employ the latest cutting-edge technologies, and enjoy the journey with your new close-knit teammates.

Get a clearer idea of how we approach the projects we develop from the podcast here, and you can have a glance at our Instagram profile.

Job Requirements: 

Fluency in English is a must since we actively use it in our day-to-day work, including retrospectives and client demos.
3+ years of software development experience with in-depth knowledge of Node.js.
Proficient in JavaScript and TypeScript, with experience in frameworks like NestJS.
Familiarity with software testing techniques.
Focus on sustainable development practices.
Understanding of functional and object-oriented programming principles.
Experience with containerized environments such as Kubernetes.
Proficiency in creating advanced GraphQL servers.
Focus on sustainable development practices.
Experience in caching for high-traffic, public-facing websites.

Great If You Have: 

Experience with GraphQL gateways, gRPC, OpenTelemetry, Microservices, feature flags, and trunk-based development.
Familiarity with TDD, BDD, and DDD.
Experience with cloud ecosystems such as AWS or Azure.
Familiarity with monorepos is also beneficial.
Passion for developing and maintaining libraries for public use or across teams.
 A backend-focused mindset with an appreciation for product and frontend impact — you think beyond endpoints and consider how your work shapes the overall user experience.
Comfort collaborating across the stack and understanding how backend choices impact the end-user experience.

What Sets You Apart:

Passion for creating scalable and sustainable code, focusing on abstraction, clean architecture, and a collaborative development process.
If you're passionate about working in a dynamic, collaborative, and agile team where your ideas are valued and can drive meaningful change.
If you believe in the importance of clear, concise, and practical documentation to improve team efficiency and ensure smooth project development.
If you enjoy working in a development process that involves active participation in daily stand-ups, PR reviews, and retrospectives, while contributing to continuous improvement and teamwork.
If you feel comfortable working with strict linting rules as part of your workflow.
If you believe in not just getting things done, but also ensuring quality and reliability by writing tests, all while maintaining this mindset throughout the product development process.
If you trust your collaboration skills and enjoy working with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize customer requirements and feedback.
If you see yourself as a team player, always reliable, responsible, and highly motivated.
Always eager to learn, open to self-improvement, and driven by a desire to discover something new every day.

Tools & Tech Stack 

We prioritize the sustainability, reliability, and purity of our code, focusing on abstractions like Separation of Concerns, layered architecture, and IoC, rather than specific technology names.

More Reasons to Become One of Us!

🌴 Epic Team Retreats: Happy people vacationing together, no awkward silences at all. Check out our YouTube!

title: Yazılım Uzmanı (Hazine)
details:
BİZ KİMİZ?
Maroteknoloji, öncelikle finans sektöründe kapsamlı bilgi teknolojisi hizmetleri sunan bağımsız bir bilişim şirketidir. Temel uzmanlık alanımız, katma değerli projeler ve en yüksek hizmet kalitesi aracılığıyla hem yurt içinde hem de uluslararası düzeyde geniş bir müşteri yelpazesine hizmet veren ve bunlarla ortaklık yapan bankacılık teknolojilerini içerir.

Aralık 2010'da Lale Maro tarafından kurulan Maroteknoloji, Bankacılık Teknolojisi, BT stratejisi oluşturma ve uygulama, BT yönetişimi, kurumsal mimari, iş analizi ve yazılım geliştirme konularında uzmanlaşmıştır. Şirket yaklaşık 150 çalışanı ile İstanbul merkezlidir.

NEDEN MAROTEKNOLOJİ?
Finans yazılımı ve proje yönetimi konusunda 20 yılı aşkın deneyime sahip deneyimli bir ekip,
Sektör, bankacılık teknolojileri ve yerel ihtiyaçlar hakkında derin bilgi birikimi (BDDK, SPK, vb.)
Gizlilik ilkelerine maksimum bağlılık, kaliteye özen ve güçlü etik değerler
En üst düzeyde müşteri memnuniyeti: İstisnasız müşterilerimiz referanslarımızdır.
Sonuç odaklı ve motivasyonu yüksek ekip; müşterilerin ihtiyaçlarına hızla uyum sağlayabilen dinamik organizasyon. Projeler zamanında ve bütçe dahilinde tamamlanır.

NASIL BİR ÇALIŞMA ARKADAŞI ARIYORUZ?
◾ Okul ödevi veya bireysel amaçlı projeler de dahil olmak üzere, yazılım projeleri geliştirmişsen,
◾ İnovasyon projelerine ilgi duyuyorsan,
◾ Kişisel gelişimin senin için önemliyse,
◾ Alanındaki sektörel ve teknolojik gelişmeleri takip etmekten keyif alıyorsan,
◾ İş birliğine dayalı etkili iletişim kurabilen biriysen ya da kendini bu alanda geliştirmek istiyorsan

BEKLENİLEN YETKİNLİKLER
◾ Üniversitelerin Bilgisayar veya diğer mühendislik bölümlerinden(Elektronik, Yazılım, Matematik vb.) mezun,
◾Bankacılık tarafında hazine deneyimi olan,

◾.Net Core 5.0, Docker, OpenShift, Istio teknolojilerine hakim,
◾Tercihen Ecommerce konusunda tecrübe sahibi,
◾Tercihen PostgreSql ve/veya Oracle veritabanlarından en az biri ile çalışmış,
◾Analitik düşünce yapısına ve problem çözme yeteneğine sahip,
◾Agile/Scrum metodolojileri ile ilgili bilgisi/deneyimi bulunan,

title: Blockchain Developer
details:
بلاکچین


 توضیحات شغلی:
ما به دنبال یک توسعه‌دهنده بلاکچین با تجربه و مهارت بالا هستیم تا به تیم فنی ما بپیوندد. شما مسئول طراحی، پیاده‌سازی و بهینه‌سازی قراردادهای هوشمند و سیستم‌های بلاکچین خواهید بود و به توسعه پروژه‌های پیشرفته در زمینه بلاکچین کمک خواهید کرد.

مهارت‌های فنی:
- آشنایی کامل با کتابخانه‌های Ethers.js و Web3.js: تسلط بر استفاده و پیاده‌سازی این کتابخانه‌ها برای تعامل با بلاکچین.
- آشنایی کامل با Account Abstraction: تسلط بر کانترکت‌های EntryPoint، Biconomy و AccountFactory.
- آشنایی با Bundler & Paymaster: درک نحوه مدیریت تراکنش‌ها با استفاده از این ابزارها.
- آشنایی کامل با کتابخانه OpenZeppelin: استفاده از کتابخانه‌های امنیتی و استانداردهای قرارداد هوشمند.
- تسلط بر متدهای تستینگ و Audit: تجربه در استفاده از ابزارهای تست و امنیت برای قراردادهای هوشمند.
- آشنایی با محیط Hardhat: تجربه در تست‌نویسی با Mocha و Chai برای Unit Testing.
- آشنایی با JavaScript: تسلط بر زبان JavaScript و تجربه در پیاده‌سازی بک‌اند با استفاده از Node.js و Ethers.js.

 ویژگی‌های شخصیتی:
- دقت بالا: توجه به جزئیات و دقت در پیاده‌سازی کدهای امن و بهینه.
- توانایی کار تیمی: توانایی همکاری مؤثر با تیم‌های مختلف فنی.
- حل مسئله و نوآوری: توانایی پیدا کردن راه‌حل‌های خلاقانه و نوآورانه برای چالش‌های بلاکچین.

نحوه ارسال درخواست:

title: Backend Developer
details:
GENEL NİTELİKLER VE İŞ TANIMI
FİRMA BİLGİLERİ
1999 yılında "Taşıt Tanıma Sistemi" vasıtasıyla akaryakıt sektörünü otomasyonla tanıştırmaya başladığımız günlerden bugüne kadar 2.5 milyonun üzerinde taşıtta, 7.000’nin üzerinde akaryakıt istasyonunda ilk Turpak tarafından geliştirilen otomasyon çözümleri çalışmaktadır. Bugün Turpak, Dow Jones ve Nasdaq borsalarında hisseleri işlem gören Vontier grubunun bir parçası olan Gilbarco’nun bir iştiraki olarak Türkiye’nin en büyük akaryakıt ve LPG dağıtım şirketlerinin pompa, tank otomasyonu, taşıt tanıma ve ödeme sistemlerinin tek çözüm ortağıdır.
Turpak, Enerji Bakanlığı bünyesindeki Enerji Piyasası Düzenleme Kurumu (EPDK) tarafından lisanslı yetkilendirilmiş otomasyon şirketi ve Maliye Bakanlığı onaylı pompa yazar kasa (ÖKC) üreticisidir.
Turpak, Türkiye'de ilk olarak RFID Taşıt Tanıma Sistemi kurulumları ve ardından, Pompa Otomasyonu, Entegre Tank Otomasyonu, Entegre Market Otomasyonu, RFID Müşteri Tanıma Sistemi, Akaryakıt ve LPG Tanker Otomasyon Sistemi, Adblue pompa ve tank otomasyon sistemi, taşıt tanıma entegreli yıkama otomasyonu ile sektörü yeniliklerle tanıştırmıştır.
İlave olarak istasyon İstatiksel Envanter Mutabakatı (SIR), Mobil Ödeme, Sadakat programları, Merkez Ofis Yazılımları, Akaryakıt Güvenlik ve Kamera-Alarm Sistemleri, Akaryakıt Erken Uyarı Sistemleri, Araç Takip Sistemleri, Akıllı Kamera ile Taşıt Tanıma ve Yazar Kasalar ile sektörünün baştan sona bütün ihtiyaçlarını karşılayabilmektedir.
Turpak, bugün 4.500 m2’lik son teknoloji ile donatılmış yeni binasında, 330 kişilik kadrosuyla ve 100’e yakın Araç ve İstasyon Yetkili Servisiyle sektöre otomasyon çözüm ortağı olarak liderlik etmektedir.

Aranan Nitelikler:

Bilgisayar Mühendisliği veya ilgili alanlarda lisans, tercihen yüksek lisans mezunu
Minimum 5 yıl profesyonel yazılım geliştirme deneyimine sahip
.NET Core/.NET 6+ uygulamalarını hem Windows hem de Linux ortamlarında geliştirme ve çalıştırma tecrübesine sahip
C# diline ve .NET platformuna derin teknik hakimiyet sahibi
Web API ve Entity Framework Core ile çalışma deneyimi olan
RESTful API tasarımı ve entegrasyonu konularında deneyimli
Mikroservis mimarisi (Microservices Architecture) konusunda bilgi sahibi
SQL Server ve/veya diğer RDBMS'ler ile ileri düzey veri modelleme ve optimizasyon bilgisine sahip
Dapper konusunda deneyime sahip ve performans odaklı veri erişimi konusunda yetkin
OOP, SOLID prensipleri ve Design Patterns konusunda ileri düzey bilgiye sahip
Clean Architecture, DDD (Domain Driven Design) gibi yazılım mimari prensiplerine aşina
Performans iyileştirme, refactoring ve kod kalite artırımı konularında deneyimli
Git/SVN gibi versiyon kontrol sistemlerinde deneyimli
Problem çözme ve analitik düşünme becerisi bulunan
Karmaşık teknik konuları ekibe ve iş birimlerine açık bir şekilde aktarabilme yeteneğine sahip
Mentor ve Liderlik becerilerine sahip: Junior ve Mid-level geliştiricilere koçluk yapabilme becerisi bulunan
Takım çalışmasına yatkın, iş birliği ve güçlü iletişim yetkinlikleri olan
Değişime ve yeni teknolojilere açık, sürekli öğrenmeyi seven yaklaşımlara sahip

title: Engineering Manager, MAAS
details:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in more than 80 countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

The company is founder led, profitable and growing.

We are hiring an Engineering Manager as we expand the MAAS team. Our mission with MAAS ("Metal as a Service") is to provide the best solution for building and running private bare-metal infrastructure, putting a cloud-style on-demand API in front of physical server provisioning, network configuration, and storage. We're hiring engineering managers with experience in high-quality software development and high-performance team leadership who also have deep familiarity with Linux on physical servers, Linux storage and data center networking capabilities.

MAAS components span the entire software stack: from low-level hardware detection and provisioning, to the upper level management web interface, API, and CLI. Our most effective engineers are fluent in all these layers, and able to anticipate the consequences of design and engineering choices elsewhere in a complex distributed system.

At Canonical you must have a solid technical background, but your responsibility is to run an effective team and develop the colleagues you manage. You are expected to help them grow as engineers, do important work, do it outstandingly well, find professional and personal satisfaction, and work well with colleagues and the community. Technical leadership experience and a background in software engineering are necessary prerequisites for this role. You will be expected to lead, challenge, and develop engineers, positively influence the culture, facilitate technical delivery, and work with your team on strategy and execution. In addition to these responsibilities, you will be expected to collaborate across engineering. The MAAS team regularly interfaces with teams responsible for cloud-init, LXD, and our public cloud offerings.

The successful candidate will have leadership attributes, deep knowledge of Linux, and can demonstrate the ability to solve challenging distributed systems problems.

Location: This is a work-from-anywhere position available in EMEA or the Americas.

The role entails

Leading a distributed team of engineers in your time zone (we organise engineering teams by Americas, EMEA etc)
Talent development through coaching, mentoring, feedback and career planning
Setting and managing expectations with other engineering teams, senior management, and external stakeholders
Being an advocate of, and advancing, modern software development practices
Participating in the engineering process through code and architectural review
Engaging with broader teams at Canonical, the open source community and partners
Travelling to internal and external global events for 4 to 6 weeks per year 

What we are looking for in you

Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
Undergraduate degree in a technical subject
Confidence to respectfully speak up, exchange feedback, and share ideas without hesitation
Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results
Leadership and commitment to skills development and mentorship
Passion for technology evidenced by personal projects and initiatives
The work ethic and confidence to shine alongside motivated colleagues
Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills
Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred) 
Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
Appreciative of diversity, polite, and effective in a multi-cultural, multi-national organization
Thoughtfulness and self-motivation
Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
Ability to travel internationally twice a year for company events up to two weeks long
You understand modern Linux cloud computing technologies, including networking, storage, containers and K8s
You have experience programming in Python and Go
You love developing and growing people and have a strong track record of doing it

Nice-to-have skills

Typescript using modern web frameworks such as React, Angular, Svelte or Vue

What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.

Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person - we've been working remotely since 2004!
Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
Annual compensation review
Recognition rewards
Annual holiday leave
Maternity and paternity leave
Employee Assistance Programme
Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events

About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: AI Automation & Shopify Web Developer
details:
AI Automation and Shopify Web Developer
Company: Ninu Limited
Location: On-site (Mezitli, Mersin, Turkey) for the first 6 months, with potential for remote work thereafter.

About Us:
Ninu Limited is an innovative startup headquartered in London, United Kingdom, with a branch office in Mersin, Turkey. We specialize in AI automation, cross-border e-commerce, and intelligent software development. Our newest venture focuses on redefining how print-on-demand (POD) stores are launched and operated through scalable, intelligent systems. We’re building a dedicated team to shape this vision into a leading solution in the e-commerce automation space.

The Role:
We’re seeking a skilled and motivated AI Automation and Web Developer to join our core team. In this role, you’ll help develop a system that streamlines the creation and deployment of AI-powered POD e-commerce stores, enabling rapid and scalable store launches with minimal human intervention. Your work will sit at the intersection of automation, e-commerce, and artificial intelligence.

What You’ll Do:
Build and maintain intelligent workflows using modern no-code/low-code tools and automation platforms.
Create front-end control interfaces and connect them with back-end services for streamlined deployment.
Develop and manage backend systems and APIs for connecting with external services (social platforms, ad networks, etc.).
Work with AI content generation tools to automate product listings, design content, and website copy.
Customize Shopify themes using Shopify Liquid and implement logic for store functionality and layout.
Automate processes including content population, inventory syncing, discount logic, and email marketing triggers.
Work with dynamic spreadsheets and structured data to feed automation pipelines.
Optimize backend data systems and collaborate with the team to improve scalability and maintainability.

What We’re Looking For:
2+ years of experience with APIs, backend development, and automation tools.
Hands-on experience with Shopify Liquid theme development and customization.
Familiarity with e-commerce SEO, structured data (like JSON-LD), and front-end best practices.
Proficiency in spreadsheet logic (Google Sheets/Excel) and basic scripting.
Understanding of integrating AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT) for content and automation workflows.
Experience with backend languages and database systems (MySQL preferred).
Logical thinker with a strong sense of system design and workflow architecture.
Advanced or upper-intermediate English proficiency.
Motivation to grow within a fast-moving startup.

What We Offer:
A chance to help build a transformative automation platform in the e-commerce space.
A collaborative and forward-thinking startup environment.
Long-term opportunity with growth potential and responsibility.
A revenue-sharing program for employees committed to our long-term vision.
Remote flexibility after the first 6 months, depending on project maturity.

How to Apply:
Apply directly through LinkedIn’s application interface.

Why Join Us?
We’re building more than a team—we’re creating a product that will shape how e-commerce businesses launch and grow. Joining now means you’ll have significant influence on the product, culture, and direction of the company. If you're excited about automation, AI, and building scalable systems that empower entrepreneurs, we want to hear from you.
